project_name: Real-Time Chat and Video Calling Application

items.title: Real-Time Text Messaging
items.description: Enable users to send and receive text messages instantly between individuals or groups.
acceptance_criteria: Messages are delivered to recipients within 1 second under normal network conditions
Messages appear in correct chronological order across all devices
Unread messages are clearly indicated to the user
non_functional: Latency under 1 second for message delivery

items.title: Video Calling Feature
items.description: Allow users to initiate and receive one-to-one and group video calls in real time.
acceptance_criteria: Users can start and receive video calls without noticeable delay
Video and audio remain synchronized with less than 200ms lag
Support for at least 4 participants in a group video call
non_functional: Audio clarity with minimal background noise

items.title: User Interface Design
items.description: Provide an intuitive and visually appealing interface for chat and video calling features.
acceptance_criteria: UI follows modern design principles and is consistent across devices
All primary actions are accessible within 2 clicks or taps
Responsive layout adapts to mobile, tablet, and desktop screens
non_functional: UI loads within 2 seconds on standard broadband

notes: Assumed that 'nice UI' refers to a modern, responsive, and accessible design. Group video calling support is assumed to be required. No specific platform (web, mobile) mentioned, so requirements are platform-agnostic.
